general.gigTitle: develop a full website in php with mysql

sellerCard.oneLiner: Full Stack Web Developer: Laravel, PHP, JS, jQuery, Bootstrap N more
sellerCard.description: Since July 2020, I have been actively working on the Fiverr marketplace as a full-stack web developer, successfully completing over 500 orders. My primary expertise lies in building custom-coded websites tailored to your specific requirements. Additionally, I excel in diving into existing codebases, troubleshooting issues, and seamlessly implementing new features. I am dedicated to writing clean, maintainable, and secure code in all my projects. With over 4 years of experience, I am proficient in Raw PHP (Procedural + OOP), Raw JS/jQuery, Bootstrap, Raw CSS, MySQL, and other technologies.

description.content:
PLEASE CONTACT ME BEFORE PLACING ORDER


Hi, there! I'm here to help you with creating a complete website from scratch using PHP with MySQL database. I'm also interested to re-develop or add new features to your existing website. Check out my services below for more details.


Languages:PHP (OOP), MySQL


Services:


  • Fetching Data From MySQL Database
  • Custom Dashboard
  • Create, Update, Delete Contents From Backend
  • Registration & Login
  • Contact Form with Captcha
  • QR Code Generator and Reader
  • Form Data Validation & Sanitization
  • Newsletter
  • Real Time Chat
  • Likes & Comments
  • Reviews
  • Shopping Cart
  • File Uploading


  • Clean and Well-Commented Code
  • Follow OOP and MVC Pattern
  • Knowledge of Git
  • Handle XSS Attacks and SQL Injection
  • Cross Browser Compatible


So, what're you waiting for? Let's get started now.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: At first, I would expect a brief explanation of your business in 2-3 sentences. Then, I would appreciate detailed specifications of the task. If I'm interested in the task, we can discuss it further.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Could you briefly explain the tech-stack to build a complete website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: One of the appropriate combinations could be: i) Raw PHP (OOP/Procedural) ii) MySQL Database iii) JavaScript/jQuery (and related useful libraries) iv) Raw CSS/Bootstrap/Tailwind.

questionsAndAnswers.question: [Important] How could you contribute regarding the design of a website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I can replicate designs from Figma or any other pre-built source. However, I can't create unique designs in the same way a UI designer can.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you work on CMS platforms like WordPress, Joomla, Shopify, Magento, and Drupal?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: First of all, I don't have core knowledge of those platforms. However, I can still help with issues related solely to CSS and JavaScript.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What to do if I can't choose an appropriate package for myself?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please feel free to message me to discuss a suitable pricing option.

openGraph.title: develop a full website in php with mysql

reviews.comment: Recommended, time and time again. Sourav and I have been working together regulary for years. He has such high level of expertise in all things custom javascript/css/html and attention to detail. on the one hand. On the other, while working with him, you will find that he also takes pride in his work and aims to provide you with the best solution, suggesting improvements and hinting on issues you didnt think about earlier to make sure your project is a success. A pleasure to work with him.

seller_response.comment: Thanks for such a wonderful feedback. It was all about building a full stack project using jQuery+Bootstrap+PHP.

reviews.comment: Another project we successfully accomblished together. This time, it involved a second API (DHL), which was not well documented. We also had to implement additional logic as legacy data caused unforseen issues and I faced some troubles deloying the code, which Sourav delivered flawlessly. Through all of that, I could count on Souravs patiences and guidance to get the project successfully done, which was much appreciated. I can recommend working with him - he knows his craft very well and is a pleasure to work with.

seller_response.comment: Thanks  it was about working with technologies like PHP, jQuery, Bootstrap, etc.

reviews.comment: Yet another successful project with Sourav - I can not say enough how glad I am to be able to work with him. If you entrust him with your code work, it is in good hands :).

Sourav Malo's work was nothing short of exceptional. The professionalism and detailed documentation truly exceeded my expectations. His deep understanding and proactive communication made working with him a breeze.  Highly recommend!

seller_response.comment: Thanks for such a wonderful feedback. It was about integrating several endpoints from live-score-api using raw PHP and jQuery.

reviews.comment: My project went very smoothly and the work was good! I will be coming back for more or for when I have new projects! Everything was very professional and Im grateful

seller_response.comment: Thanks, it was about building a simple management system in TALL stack along with deploying to an ubuntu vps server.

notableClients.name: Bookalista
notableClients.interaction_description: Bookalista is a marketplace to discover fiction, non-fiction, children's books, and study books for sale by sellers from all over Denmark. As a frontend developer, I fixed numerous CSS issues and created many Figma to React+CSS designs from scratch.

enriched_details.name: Bookalista
enriched_details.description: Bookalista is an online marketplace for buying and selling books.
